mapper.insert: insert into tbl_post(c_code, s_code, u_code, p_title, p_content) values((select ifnull(max(c_code), 1) from tbl_condition), #{s_code}, #{u_code}, #{p_title}, #{p_content})
mapper.select: select p.*, c.headcount, c.gender, c.age from tbl_post p, tbl_condition c where c.c_code = p.c_code and s_code = #{s_code}
select p.*, c.age, c.gender, c.headcount from tbl_post p, tbl_condition c where p_code = #{p_code} and p.c_code = c.c_code
